about.goalText: To create an innovative platform that provides useful information by analyzing your health data. Our assistant helps you understand your health status based on average heart rate, blood pressure, current medications, medical reports, birth date, weight, height, and other data, and can predict potential health problems.

Enter your health data such as heart rate, blood pressure, height, weight, etc.

about.whyChooseUsText: Our health advisory system is built on modern technology that simplifies the management and analysis of your health data. With the integration of an intuitive user interface and artificial intelligence, you can gain a comprehensive understanding of your health status. It's the ideal choice for anyone who wants to actively track and improve their health.
